thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com
thread.title: SHIRLEY

author: SHIRLEY
title: SHIRLEY
text: This course was rather comprehensive. The driving maneuvers often had a video demonstrating the concept. Five of mine did not display, but I went ahead and took the final doing very well. I learned things that I did not know, and I have been driving for years. It should be a requirement for all drivers to take every so often, maybe every decade, just to keep up with progress and changes.
